title: Warsongs not on Spotify or Soundcloud

embed.description: Amp up your in-game plays by injecting new beats into classic League tunes. Warsongs is a new collection of remixed anthems to accompany your competitive climb during the 2016 Season, and it's yours to download below.

body: So it says at the bottom that the warsongs are available on the following application but i looked and cant find them. Is anyone else having trouble with this?

replies.body: Sorry for the delay folks. We had a bit of a hiccup, but you should see it on Spotify now.

I know that if you have the Spotify client, it will search your disk for music as well. It's how I got Taylor Swift on Spotify again (yes my guilty pleasure :)). I just downloaded the songs and moved them into a playlist in Spotify, so I think that is what they meant? As for Soundcloud, I have no idea.
I tried doing just that and for some reason all the files i tried to add are just spazzing out. They arent playing in spotify and its driving me nuts
It started doing that for me at first. I restarted the client and Spotify got its shit together.
